title: [K-12] Augmented Reality-Based Digital Media Art Creation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and comprehension of art expression techniques
context.additional_context: Provision of augmented reality content creation environments for individual student creative activities, with sharing of learning outcomes through digital media art exhibitions

learning_goals: Can explain methods for arranging visual elements in 3D space using augmented reality tools
Enhancing the visual impact of digital media artworks by over 20% through the addition of interactive features
Completed works from team projects can be exhibited in a virtual reality gallery and receive feedback

resources: AR Development Kit (ZigSpace, Merge Cube, etc.)
Digital Art Creation Software (CoSpaces Edu, Tilt Brush)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
